title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 854/97 of 13 May 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3886/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the premium schemes provided for in the beef and veal sector as regards the processing premium for young calves
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 854/97 of 13 May 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3886/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the premium schemes provided for in the beef and veal sector as regards the processing premium for young calves
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 49 (4) of Regulation (EC) No 3886/92 is hereby replaced by the following:
'4. The premium per eligible calf shall amount to:
- ECU 115 per calf of a dairy breed,
and
- ECU 145 per calf of a non-dairy breed.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the first Monday following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 May 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
